incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. Start time : 06/05/2025 06:30 UTC End time : 06/05/2025 21:00 UTC Service impact : No impact on vSphere UI, data availability, and virtual machines. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple storage servers. Thank you for your understanding.
We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

affected_components.name: Managed VMware Cloud Director || ERI - Storage

scheduled_maintenances.name: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - Host replacement maintenance notification

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. This may temporarily affect the availability of vMotion. Start time : 19/05/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 23/05/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : Concerned hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the operation and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Hosted Private Cloud offer, we will be replacing Hosted Private Cloud's hosts by new ones. Concerned customers will receive a notification regarding the replacement of their hosts. Thank you for your understanding.
